mapper.insert: insert into oms_order_return_reason (id, `name`, sort, `status`, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, `name`, sort, `status`, create_time from oms_order_return_reason
